channel.title: 525 gameframe
channel.description:
so title says all im trying to add 525 gameframe but when i do, my maparea look like this
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/29lmtet.jpg[/img]
heres my client.java http://pastebin.com/0tym0qSc
EDIT1; so ive fixed having the double maparea, but its still black.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/23mpw1.jpg[/img]
EDIT2; so i got rid of the black background, but for some reason its still thinking that the old maparea is there [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/34xgy04.jpg[/img]
